text:
Disclosure: This post may contain affiliate links. What does that mean?

448 shares Pin 448

Share









Looking for unique gifts for tequila lovers? Indulge the tequila fan with one of these genius gifts!

Tequila Gift Baskets

Who doesn’t love getting gift baskets? It’s so much fun to suddenly have a treasure chest of goodies arrive on your front porch!

My favorite site for gift baskets that include tequila based gifts is TheBroBasket. They have a wonderful selection of ready-made tequila gift baskets, as well as a design-it-yourself option where you can customize your own tequila gift basket.

Impress someone special with one of these festive tequila gift baskets.

Viva Tequila Gift Basket from BroBasket



Impress your favorite tequila lover with this striking tequila gift basket! Awesome gift basket includes four bottles of high-end Patron™ tequilas.

There’s also two mini Coronas™ (because sometimes you need a break from Tequila), 2 shot glasses, and a mini salt shaker.

Jose Cuervo Margarita Gift Basket Resposado Tequila Sampler Gift Set Don Julio Tequila Tasting Set Patron Silver Tequila Gift Bakset

Bar Gifts for Tequila Lovers

Elegant Mezcal Tequila Glasses

Impress your favorite tequila drinker with these elegant shot glasses that are designed for mezcal. The distinctive shape enhances the tequila experience by allowing the aroma to be just at the drinker’s nose.





Personalized Tequila Decanter

The sophisticated tequila drinker will appreciate this handsome personalized tequila decanter.

Unique tequila decanter is crafted from a genuine Patron tequila bottle, and engraved with the recipient’s name. You can add an optional message to the back.

An elegant addition to the home bar!





The Ultimate Tequila Serving Set

Everything you need to get the fiesta started! Lovely set features a wooden serving tray/cutting board, a ceramic knife, 4 shot glasses, 2 salt dipping plates and 4 flavored salts. Perfect for the entertainer!





Margaritaville Frozen Concoction Maker

Why limit yourself (and your guests) to just one kind of margarita, when it’s almost as easy to make 3? The die-hard margarita fan needs a restaurant quality frozen drink maker!





Tequila Making Kits

The true tequila fan will probably get a kick out of making their own potion at home! They can save money,(you can order additional flavor packs), and

Impressive tequila making kit includes everything they’ll need…and this striking personalized barrel to age and store it in!

Tequila Infusion Kit

Delight your favorite tequila fan with a tequila infusion kit!

Variety pack of tequila infusion blends includes chili, smokey and lime flavors. Perfect for a last-minute party – the blends can infuse in 2-6 hours.

Funny Gifts for People Who Love Tequila

Follow Me Bring Tequila Flip Flops



Declare your love for tequila with every step you take with these funny flip flops!

Choose from over 10 colors…perfect gift for the man or woman who’s planning a beach vacation. If you’re looking for

his and hers gift ideas

, get a matching set for your favorite couple.







Turn on your JavaScript to view content

“Might Be Tequila” Coffee Mug

Because the sad truth is that it’s not always 5 o’clock somewhere…and sometimes you need a jolt of caffeine to get you through until it’s tequila time.





Tequila Mockingbird: Cocktails with a Literary Twist

You can never have too many recipes for margaritas ! Clever cocktail recipe book is witty and fun – and has great recipes! Perfect small gift for any occasion.





Tequila Flasks



The die-hard tequila fan probably wants to take their favorite beverage with them when traveling. A flask dedicated just to tequila is a useful and fun gift idea.

Zazzle offers a wonderful selection of funny flasks for tequila lovers. The one pictured above is perfect for anyone who has been known to make poor decisions after a few shots.



The perfect pillow to rest your head on while recovering from a hangover!

Personalized Gifts for Tequila Lovers

Personalized Tequila Bar Sign

Every passionate tequila fan needs a personalized sign for their bar, basement, or mancave/womancave!

Etsy has a fabulous collection of over 20 personalized tequila bar signs and bar mats. Prices start at under $20, so you can find a unique gift that he or she will love even if you’re on a tight budget.

Inexpensive Tequila Lover’s Gifts Under $25

You don’t have to spend a fortune to impress your favorite tequila devotee – these unique gifts are under $25!

Himalayan Salt Shot Glasses

Where there’s tequila, there’s bound to be salt. Do away with the messy salt shaker…just add a lime, your favorite tequila, and you’re ready to party!







Unique Gifts for Tequila Lovers

Electrolyte Infused Margarita Mix Set



The tequila fan who is also a health nut is sure to appreciate this delicious margarita mix that’s infused with electrolytes and vitamins. Perfect for the drinker who wants to run a 5k the next day!

Department 56 Margaritaville Village

a There’s a Dept. 56 village collection for everything nowadays. Give your favorite margarita fan one of the buildings or figurines from the Margaritaville collection…you can add on to it each year, which means you’ll already have gifts lined up for quite a few gift-giving occasions!

Need More Gift Ideas? Check out these Christmas gift guides:











Christmas Gift Guides by Interest
